ComicInfo.Summary: Jade and Lord Akuma take up arms against Ottoman, and Mother Superion rides to the rescue with her Black Angels squadron. Meanwhile, a group of genetically-engineered were-cheetahs created from Cheetah Diggers' DNA attack our heroes.
ComicInfo.Tags: Cheetah,Jason,Tomorrow Man,Mother Superion,Father Terrance Gomez,Herr Ottoman,Warrior Nun Areala,Lord Akuma,Ninja Nun,Jade Yashiki,Serina,Demon Foster,Oni,Captain Yoma,Nazis
